description: Default content for new maid service tenants - used during provisioning

hero.subtitle: Reliable, thorough cleaning services for your home. From regular maintenance to deep cleaning, we deliver spotless results every time.

about.title: About Our Cleaning Service
about.content:
We provide professional residential cleaning services with attention to detail and commitment to customer satisfaction. Our trained, insured team members use quality products and proven techniques to deliver consistently excellent results.

Whether you need regular maintenance cleaning or a thorough deep clean, we customize our service to meet your specific needs and preferences.

footer.tagline: Professional house cleaning you can trust
footer.description: Reliable residential cleaning services with attention to detail and commitment to your satisfaction.

contact.callToAction: Ready for a spotlessly clean home?
contact.description: Contact us today for a free quote or to schedule your cleaning service.
